Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointment
Description: This class is the controller for the page for adding appointments (AddAppointment.fxml)
AddCustomer
Description: This class is the controller for the AddCustomer page
Alerts
Description: Contains alert helper functions
Appointment
Description: Model class containing appointment data
AppointmentDAO
Description: This class contains static methods to interact with the database on appointment data
AppointmentSchedule
Description: This class is the controller for the appointment schedule page.
Contact
Description: Model class containing contact data
ContactDAO
Description: This class contains static methods to interact with the database on contact data
Country
Description: Model class containing country data
Customer
Description: Model class containing customer data
CustomerDAO
Description: This class contains static methods to interact with the database on customer data
Dashboard
Description: This class is the controller for the Dashboard scene, which is set when user successfully logs in.
DBConnection
Description: Connect to MySql database
FirstLevDivision
Description: Model class containing first-level division data
FXML_Helpers
Description: This class contains helper functions to increase amount of reusable code
GenerateReports
Description: This class is the controller for the page that generates the three reports.
LocationDAO
Description: This class contains static methods to interact with the database on country and first-level division data
LoginForm
Description: Controller for the initial log-in scene.
Main
Description: The Main class sets the initial scene and launches the application.
Misc_Helpers
Description: Contains some helper functions used in program to reduce clutter and increase readability
ModifyAppointment
Description: This class is the controller for the page for updating appointments (ModifyAppointments.fxml).
ModifyCustomer
Description: This class is the controller for the Modify Customer page
ReportsDAO
Description: This class contains static methods to interact with the database to generate reports
Time_Helpers
Description: Contains time-related helper functions used in program to reduce clutter and increase readability
User
Description: Model class containing user data
UserDAO
Description: This class contains static methods to interact with the database on user data
ViewCustomers
Description: This class is the controller for the page to view all customers.
